content: down in the valley rr afghan by julee a reeves materials 32-48 ozs of worsted weight yarn in your choice of color i crochet hook tapestry needle for weaving in ends special stitches and abbreviations shell- 2dc ch2 2dc in specified space or stitch v-st- double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in specified space or stitch beg- beginning © julee a reeves 2014 this pattern is meant for personal/chairty use if you would like to sell items made from this pattern please email me at julee_reeves@yahoo com instructions round 1 ch5 double_crochet ch1 7 times in 5th chain from hook slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 counts as first double_crochet 8 double_crochet 8 ch1 sps round 2 slip_stitch around post of beg ch3 of previous round ch3 v-st in next ch1 space fpdc around next double_crochet 7 times v-st in next ch1 space slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 8 fpdc v-st shells round 3 slip_stitch around post of beg ch3 of previous round ch3 skip next double_crochet shell in next ch2 space skip next double_crochet fpdc around next double_crochet 7 times skip next double_crochet shell in next ch2 space slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 8 shells 8 fpdc round 4 slip_stitch around post of beg ch3 of previous round ch3 skip next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet skip next double_crochet fpdc around next double_crochet 7 times skip next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 8 shells 16dc 8 fpdc round 5 slip_stitch around post of beg ch3 of previous round ch3 skip next double_crochet double_crochet in each double_crochet to ch2 space shell in ch2 space double_crochet in each double_crochet across to 1 st before next fpdc fpdc around next double_crochet 7 times skip next double_crochet double_crochet in each double_crochet to ch2 space shell in next ch2 space double_crochet in each double_crochet across to 1 st before next fpdc slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 8 shells 8 fpdc 32 double_crochet- each round after this one the double_crochet count will increase by 16 repeat round 5 until you reach the size needed work desired edging then weave in ends 2 rounds of single_crochet is a nice finish for this blanket © julee a reeves 2014 this pattern is meant for personal/chairty use if you would like to sell items made from this pattern please email me at julee_reeves@yahoo com
